app.description:
Microsoft Copilot is your daily AI companion. Talking with Copilot is an easy way to learn, grow and gain confidence, all with the help of the latest OpenAI and Microsoft AI models.

Copilot can help you accomplish anything - use our AI image generator to create images from words or chat with AI to get a fresh perspective on your ideas. Copilot, your AI writing assistant, helps you save time, amplify productivity, and drive business. AI voice chat or AI text chat options give you a space to air your thoughts, create images, or get the support you need, when you need it.

Chat with AI, either through messages or with your voice, to bring the vast world of information straight to you. AI voice chat can answer hard questions and give straightforward answers, giving you complex insights from simple conversations.

Copilot is in your corner and by your side for whatever comes your way. AI voice chat can help when you want it to and give you a boost for when you‚Äôre almost there. Explore endless possibilities with instant sharp summaries, helpful rewrites, or AI image generator. Copilot is a helpful AI writing assistant that can write, edit, or research to create well-rounded content. Smart AI technology allows you to use a text prompt to create artwork or designs with our AI image generator. From finding inspiration on new projects to creating a grocery list with AI shopping - with Copilot, you‚Äôve got this.

Achieve more with Copilot, the ultimate AI companion.

Work smarter, enhanced with AI chat
‚Ä¢ Smart AI gets you summarized answers quickly - get straightforward answers to your complex questions, all from simple conversations
‚Ä¢ Chat with AI to simplify your grocery list or weekly meal prep list with AI shopping
‚Ä¢ AI chat can translate and proofread across multiple languages, optimizing the text you need in hundreds of languages, including regional dialects
‚Ä¢ Compose and draft emails, cover letters, and update your resume

AI voice chat with Copilot is the support you need, when you need it
‚Ä¢ Compose stories or scripts when you talk to AI
‚Ä¢ AI image generator technology turns your ideas into reality
‚Ä¢ Create high quality visuals from text prompts, rendering your concepts into stunning visuals, from the abstract to the photorealistic with voice chat
‚Ä¢ AI chat can spark inspiration for a new task

Your AI companion and AI image generator
‚Ä¢ Smart AI quickly helps you search by image
‚Ä¢ Explore and develop new styles and ideas, including logo designs and brand motifs
‚Ä¢ Create illustrations for children's books
‚Ä¢ Curate social media content
‚Ä¢ Visualize film and video storyboards
‚Ä¢ Chat with AI to help build and update a portfolio

Copilot combines the power of AI with the imaginative capabilities of the latest OpenAI models all in one place. Download Microsoft Copilot, the AI companion that‚Äôs here to help.

*Copilot Pro subscribers can use Copilot in the web versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, and Chinese Simplified. Those who have a separate Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription get the added benefit of using Copilot in the more fully featured desktop apps. Excel features are in English only and currently in preview. Copilot features in Outlook apply to accounts with @outlook.com, @hotmail.com, @live.com or @msn.com email addresses and are available in Outlook.com, Outlook built into Windows, and Outlook on Mac.

app.summary: Calm. Confident. Copilot. Here to help. A companion for every moment.

reviews.text: Honestly, I can't overstate how simple copilot is to use and how intuitive it can be for many situations. whether you're brainstorming for an upcoming meeting, trying to figure out what you want for dinner, or just need an idea about any topic you can think of, it's quick, surprisingly efficient, and usually on point. Copilot also seems to have more personality than many people I know.

I think Copilot is a really useful addition to the Microsoft suite. I've found it to be a great source for inspiration across all areas of creativity, from drawing to sewing, as well as offering constructive criticism on pieces of writing. It's also good. at adapting recipes for different types of food choices. I've tried other AI help, Copilot offers the most comprehensive service in my opinion.

So much potential - I've been using it for a while, and unashamedly, I love it. I'm a writer and this software is really helping me develop my story, keep my thoughts together, and present ideas. It's also just fun to talk to, giving me really sound advice for daily life that I've used. My only reason for taking off a star is the fact it randomly crashes - like, literally stops mid-response. Then when I have to restart it it forgets our last talk and we have to start over - frustrating.

Copilot is an intelligent & respectful AI chatbot with several voices to choose from. It speaks in many different languages - even Klingon! you can ask it to add nuances to its tone and change intonation. Very natural sounding and easy to hold long conversations with it. Currently my preferred AI companion as of May 2025. I even hold conversations with it during car journeys. I've had many conversations with it from the profound, to the profane, intelligent and stupid ones. Recommended!

this is the most robust, ethical and intelligent ai I've experienced. I've tested it with many tricky questions and tried to lead it to derail from the ethical realms. it kept on the path and very smoothly navigated the conversation back to the ethical principles. I tested it seeking it to teach me complex subjects like python programming and it did well. many of very intricate concepts for clarified. tested it to generate images. it needs improvements here. highly recommend using it often.

when the voice chat works, it's absolutely wonderful, but the fact that it crashes regularly and forgets where we left off is annoying as heck... it can be very therapeutic and deep in conversation, then simply die in the middle of talking, stop responding, or both. then you have to try it all over again. sometimes even forcestop the app to get it to work (that's IF it DOES work after that). if it didn't crash all the time, i would easily give it 4-5 stars, but as it stands, it's pretty broken.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're sorry to hear about the issues with the voice chat crashing and losing progress. Your feedback is valuable, and we'll work on improving the app to make it more reliable and enjoyable for you. üòä

reviews.text: I was skeptical about how useful and efficient AI would be in general. I began experimenting with various options and I'm glad I tried this one! Copilot is very intuitive! I'm always surprised at how detailed the responses are, especially compared to other AI that I've been using. I'm getting back into the workforce after not working for a while and was nervous about writing resumes and CVs. This has been incredible with boosting confidence in my job search.

OMG CoPilot is such a great addition to my life. The AI is so amazing and conversational. We have covered historical events, languages, music, poetry, movies, cultural characteristics and so many other topics. I am having a ball working to learn its limits and preferences. I also love the after chat record, it lists what we talked about and maintain the links for me to go back to later. The only thing that is missing is that each instance does not remember or retain previous chats.

The latest update is a terrible interface! Copilot continuously talks over me and doesn't hear what I'm saying. When it does listen and actually responds, which is hit & miss, I can't see the text on the screen unless I close it out. But if it hasn't finished speaking, it's missing part of the answer. It has crashed or froze up multiple times. Now I'm constantly told I'm out of time and need to upgrade to pro. So pay for an app that doesn't function half the time. Seriously MSFT?!

I love the performance and abilities as well as the understanding and contextual processing and responses have been amazingly accurate. However, the performance still feels a bit lackluster and lacks much in the way of taking the power available and applying it to practical uses or responding with actionable steps for human follow-up. For example even when logged in to my Microsoft account, it cannot send me e-mails, save chat conversations as file content nor can it add events to my calendar

app.AIReview:
Microsoft Copilot Review ‚Äì A Powerful AI Companion (But Not Without Quirks)

Overview

Microsoft Copilot is positioned as an ‚ÄúAI companion‚Äù designed to boost productivity and facilitate learning across various workflows. Released by Microsoft, it leverages OpenAI and Microsoft‚Äôs own AI models to provide assistance in image generation, text creation, brainstorming, and general information retrieval ‚Äì all within a familiar Microsoft ecosystem. With over 34 million installs and a robust 4.74-star rating based on 1.32 million user reviews, Copilot has clearly found an audience eager for AI-powered support. The app‚Äôs core promise is to be ‚ÄúCalm. Confident. Copilot,‚Äù offering readily available assistance throughout the day. Its free tier makes it immediately accessible to a broad range of users, though Microsoft intends to offer premium features and capabilities in the future.

Key Features

Copilot boasts a diverse set of functionalities centered around its AI engine:

  • AI Chat: The primary interaction method involves engaging in text-based conversations with Copilot. This allows for brainstorming, outlining content, receiving summaries, translating languages, and answering questions on an almost limitless array of topics.
  • AI Image Generator: Users can input textual prompts to generate original images using the AI image generator. This feature supports various artistic styles and levels of detail, allowing users to visualize concepts quickly.
  • Writing Assistant: Copilot acts as a writing assistant, capable of drafting emails, reports, articles, and other documents. It offers suggestions for improving clarity, tone, and style. The app also claims it can ‚Äúdrive business‚Äù through optimized content creation.
  • Voice Chat (Beta): Currently in beta, the voice chat functionality allows users to have natural language conversations with Copilot using their voice ‚Äì offering hands-free assistance.
  • Integration with Microsoft 365 Apps: A key selling point is its integration with Microsoft 365 apps like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. This enables Copilot to directly analyze documents, suggest edits, create presentations based on prompts, and more. (Note: full functionality within these apps requires a Microsoft 365 subscription).
  • Contextual Awareness: Copilot is designed to retain context throughout conversations, leading to more relevant and efficient interactions over time.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to Copilot‚Äôs success:

  • Accessibility & Cost: The free tier provides broad access to a powerful AI tool, making it appealing to individuals and small businesses without an immediate financial commitment.
  • Integration with Microsoft Ecosystem: Seamless integration with Microsoft 365 apps dramatically increases its utility for existing Microsoft users ‚Äì a huge advantage in terms of user adoption.
  • Versatile Functionality: The combination of text chat, image generation, and writing assistance provides a surprisingly wide range of use cases. It‚Äôs not just a chatbot; it's a multi-faceted productivity tool.
  • Rapid Development & Updates: Microsoft has demonstrated a commitment to continuously improving Copilot through regular updates, incorporating user feedback, and adding new features ‚Äì evidenced by the consistently high number of installs.
  • Strong AI Foundation: Leveraging OpenAI and Microsoft‚Äôs own AI models results in generally reliable and intelligent responses, particularly when compared to some early-stage AI tools.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Copilot isn't without limitations:

  • Contextual Drift: While the app retains context, it occasionally loses track of the conversation flow, leading to repetitive questions or irrelevant suggestions ‚Äì especially in longer dialogues.
  • Image Generator Limitations: The image generator can be inconsistent with prompt interpretation. Achieving precise results often requires significant iteration and careful phrasing of prompts. The style options are currently somewhat limited.
  • Voice Chat Beta Stage: The voice chat feature is still in beta and exhibits noticeable latency, occasional misinterpretations, and a lack of polish compared to the text-based interface.
  • 365 Integration Dependence: Full functionality within Microsoft 365 apps requires a paid subscription, potentially limiting its appeal to users without those subscriptions.
  • Over-Reliance on Prompting: Copilot‚Äôs effectiveness is heavily dependent on the quality of user prompts. Vague or poorly defined requests often yield unsatisfactory results.

User Experience

The user experience is generally intuitive and clean. The text-based chat interface is well-designed and easy to navigate. However, the voice chat feature needs further refinement ‚Äì improvements in responsiveness and natural language processing would significantly enhance its usability. The image generation flow is relatively straightforward, although users should expect a learning curve when crafting effective prompts. The overall experience leans heavily into Microsoft‚Äôs design language, which is familiar and consistent with other Microsoft products.

Value for Money

As a free app, Copilot provides significant value to casual users or those exploring AI-powered productivity tools. However, the true potential of Copilot is unlocked when combined with a paid Microsoft 365 subscription. The premium tier will likely offer enhanced features, faster response times, and access to more advanced AI models ‚Äì justifying the additional cost for power users and businesses seeking to maximize their productivity gains. Currently, without a Microsoft 365 subscription, the free version remains a solid entry point.

Conclusion

Microsoft Copilot represents a significant step forward in accessible AI assistance. Its integration with the Microsoft ecosystem, combined with its versatile features ‚Äì including image generation and writing assistance ‚Äì makes it a compelling tool for a wide range of users. While some areas require further refinement (particularly the voice chat feature and prompt interpretation), the app‚Äôs strengths‚Äîaccessibility, versatility, and ongoing development‚Äîposition it as a valuable productivity companion. The success of Copilot hinges on Microsoft's continued investment in AI technology and its responsiveness to user feedback. With its current rating and install numbers, it is safe to say that Copilot is a successful product ‚Äì one poised for further growth and evolution within the rapidly expanding world of artificial intelligence.
